```{r setup, include = FALSE, results = 'hide', warning = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.pos = 'H'
)

library(readxl)
library(data.table)
library(flextable)
library(huxtable)
library(knitr)
library(officer)
library(kableExtra)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(ggplot2))
#library(cowplot)


```

> this is how to print a flextable in a R Markdown document
    

```{r}
data <- fread("X:/ScHARR/PR_Disease_Risk_TA/Code/Table_formatting/dist_effects_yll.csv", header = TRUE)
data <- flextable(data)
data <- merge_v(data, j = c("Sex"))
data <- colformat_int(data, j = c("2035", "2091"),
      big.mark = ",", na_str = "", prefix = "", suffix = "")

data <- autofit(data)


data <- theme_vanilla(data)
fix_border_issues(data)

```
